# euosi

The Open Soil Index (OSI) is a method to evaluate the quality of soils
of agricultural fields and the sustainability of the current
agricultural practices. The OSI score is based on four main criteria:
chemical, physical, biological and management. This package is the
European implementation of the Dutch Open Bodem Index Calculator (OBIC).
By providing results of a soil analysis and management info the ‘euosi’
package can be use to calculate the scores, indicators and derivatives
that are used to evaluate soil quality.

The current R package is still in development. If you want to
contribute, please contact the main developers Gerard Ros or Elise van
Eynde.

More information about the Open soil Index can be found at
<https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.est.2c04516#>.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`cf_ind_importance()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/cf_ind_importance.md)
  : Helper function to weight and correct the risk and scores
- [`oci_c_magnesium_cz()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/oci_c_magnesium_cz.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Czech Republic
- [`oci_c_magnesium_ee()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/oci_c_magnesium_ee.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Estonia
- [`osi_b_pmn()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_b_pmn.md)
  : Calculate the index for the microbial biological activity (wrapper
  function)
- [`osi_b_pmn_eu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_b_pmn_eu.md)
  : Calculate the index for the microbial biological activity across the
  EU
- [`osi_b_pmn_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_b_pmn_nl.md)
  : Calculate the index for the microbial biological activity in the
  Netherlands
- [`osi_biodiversity()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_biodiversity.md)
  : Calculate a biodiversity index
- [`osi_c_boron()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_boron_ch()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_ch.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index in Switzerland
- [`osi_c_boron_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_de.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index in Germany
- [`osi_c_boron_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_fr.md)
  : Calculate the B availability index for agricultural soils in France
- [`osi_c_boron_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_ie.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index in Ireland
- [`osi_c_boron_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_nl.md)
  : Calculate the B availability index for agricultural soils in the
  Netherlands
- [`osi_c_boron_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_pt.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index in Portugal
- [`osi_c_boron_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_se.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index in Sweden
- [`osi_c_boron_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_boron_uk.md)
  : Calculate the boron availability index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_c_copper()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_copper.md)
  : Calculate the copper availability index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_copper_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_copper_fr.md)
  : Calculate the Cu availability index for France
- [`osi_c_copper_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_copper_ro.md)
  : Calculate the Cu availability index for agricultural soils in
  Romania
- [`osi_c_magnesium()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_magnesium_at()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_at.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Austria
- [`osi_c_magnesium_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_be.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Belgium
- [`osi_c_magnesium_ch()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_ch.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Switzerland
- [`osi_c_magnesium_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_de.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Germany
- [`osi_c_magnesium_dk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_dk.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Denmark
- [`osi_c_magnesium_es()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_es.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Spain
- [`osi_c_magnesium_fi()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_fi.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Finland
- [`osi_c_magnesium_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_fr.md)
  : Calculate the Mg availability index for France
- [`osi_c_magnesium_hu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_hu.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Hungary
- [`osi_c_magnesium_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_ie.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Ireland
- [`osi_c_magnesium_it()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_it.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Italy
- [`osi_c_magnesium_lt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_lt.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Lithuania
- [`osi_c_magnesium_lv()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_lv.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Latvia
- [`osi_c_magnesium_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_nl.md)
  : Calculate the capacity of soils to supply Magnesium
- [`osi_c_magnesium_no()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_no.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Norway
- [`osi_c_magnesium_pl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_pl.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Poland
- [`osi_c_magnesium_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_pt.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Portugal
- [`osi_c_magnesium_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_ro.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Romenia
- [`osi_c_magnesium_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_se.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Sweden
- [`osi_c_magnesium_sk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_sk.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Slovak Republic
- [`osi_c_magnesium_sl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_sl.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in Slovenia
- [`osi_c_magnesium_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_magnesium_uk.md)
  : Calculate the magnesium availability index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_c_nitrogen()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_nitrogen.md)
  : Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_nitrogen_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_nitrogen_be.md)
  : Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity in Belgium
- [`osi_c_nitrogen_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_nitrogen_de.md)
  : Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity in Germany
- [`osi_c_nitrogen_eu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_nitrogen_eu.md)
  : Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity template in Europe
- [`osi_c_nitrogen_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_nitrogen_fr.md)
  : Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity in France
- [`osi_c_nitrogen_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_nitrogen_nl.md)
  : Calculate the soil nitrogen supplying capacity in the Netherlands
- [`osi_c_ph()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph.md)
  : Calculate the pH index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_ph_at()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_at.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in Austria
- [`osi_c_ph_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_be.md)
  : Calculate the pH index for Belgium
- [`osi_c_ph_ch()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_ch.md)
  : Calculate the pH index for Switzerland
- [`osi_c_ph_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_de.md)
  : Calculate the pH index for soils in Germany
- [`osi_c_ph_el()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_el.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in Greece
- [`osi_c_ph_eu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_eu.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in Europe when no country specific evaluation
  is present
- [`osi_c_ph_fi()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_fi.md)
  : Calculate the pH index for Finland
- [`osi_c_ph_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_fr.md)
  : Calculate the pH index for France
- [`osi_c_ph_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_ie.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in Ireland
- [`osi_c_ph_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_nl.md)
  : Calculate the distance for target for soil pH in view of the crop
  production function
- [`osi_c_ph_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_pt.md)
  : Calculate the pH index for Portugal
- [`osi_c_ph_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_ro.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in Romenia
- [`osi_c_ph_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_se.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in Sweden
- [`osi_c_ph_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_ph_uk.md)
  : Calculate the pH index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_c_phosphor()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_phosphor_at()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_at.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Austria
- [`osi_c_phosphor_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_be.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Belgium
- [`osi_c_phosphor_ch()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_ch.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Switzerland
- [`osi_c_phosphor_cz()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_cz.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Czech Republic
- [`osi_c_phosphor_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_de.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Germany
- [`osi_c_phosphor_dk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_dk.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Denmark
- [`osi_c_phosphor_ee()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_ee.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Estonia
- [`osi_c_phosphor_el()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_el.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Greece

  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Spain

  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in France

  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Ireland

  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Italy

  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Latvia

  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in the Netherlands

  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Norway
- [`osi_c_phosphor_pl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_pl.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Poland
- [`osi_c_phosphor_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_pt.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Portugal
- [`osi_c_phosphor_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_ro.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Romenia
- [`osi_c_phosphor_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_se.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in Sweden

  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Slovak Republic
- [`osi_c_phosphor_sl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_sl.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus availability index in Slovenia
- [`osi_c_phosphor_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_phosphor_uk.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate availability index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_c_potassium()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium.md)
  : Calculate the K availability index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_potassium_at()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_at.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Austria
- [`osi_c_potassium_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_be.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Belgium

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Switzerland

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Czech Republic

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Germany

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Denmark

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Greece

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Spain

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Finland

  : Calculate the potassium availability index in France
- [`osi_c_potassium_hu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_hu.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Hungary
- [`osi_c_potassium_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_ie.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Ireland
- [`osi_c_potassium_it()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_it.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Italy
- [`osi_c_potassium_lt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_lt.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Lithuania
- [`osi_c_potassium_lv()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_lv.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Latvia
- [`osi_c_potassium_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_nl.md)
  : Calculate the K availability index for the Netherlands
- [`osi_c_potassium_no()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_no.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Norway
- [`osi_c_potassium_pl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_pl.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Poland
- [`osi_c_potassium_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_pt.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Portugal
- [`osi_c_potassium_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_ro.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Romenia
- [`osi_c_potassium_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_se.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Sweden
- [`osi_c_potassium_sk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_sk.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Slovak Republic
- [`osi_c_potassium_sl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_sl.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in Slovenia
- [`osi_c_potassium_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_potassium_uk.md)
  : Calculate the potassium availability index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_c_zinc()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc.md)
  : Calculate the Zinc availability index for agricultural soils
  (wrapper function)
- [`osi_c_zinc_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_de.md)
  : Calculate the zinc availability index in Germany
- [`osi_c_zinc_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_fr.md)
  : Calculate the Zn availability index for agricultural soils in France
- [`osi_c_zinc_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_ie.md)
  : Calculate the Zn availability index for agricultural soils in
  Ireland
- [`osi_c_zinc_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_nl.md)
  : Calculate the Zn availability index for the Netherlands
- [`osi_c_zinc_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_pt.md)
  : Calculate the Zn availability index for Portugal
- [`osi_c_zinc_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_ro.md)
  : Calculate the Zn availability index for agricultural soils in
  Romenia
- [`osi_c_zinc_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_c_zinc_uk.md)
  : Calculate the Zn availability index for agricultural soils in United
  Kingdom
- [`osi_carbon()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_carbon.md)
  : Calculate a carbon index
- [`osi_checkvar()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_checkvar.md)
  : Wrapper function to test euosi input variables for the correct input
  values or options
- [`osi_checkvarfun()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_checkvarfun.md)
  : Test euosi input variables for the correct input values or options
- [`osi_clim`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_clim.md)
  : Averaged climatic conditions per country
- [`osi_conv_hwb()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_hwb.md)
  : Calculate A_B_HW
- [`osi_conv_magnesium()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_magnesium.md)
  : Estimate soil extractable magnesium (-)
- [`osi_conv_npmn()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_npmn.md)
  : Calculate potential mineralizable N for agricultural soils default
  values are taken from global ISRIC database
- [`osi_conv_ph()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_ph.md)
  : Estimate soil pH values (-)
- [`osi_conv_phosphor()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_phosphor.md)
  : Estimate soil extractable phosphorus (-)
- [`osi_conv_potassium()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_potassium.md)
  : Estimate soil extractable potassium (-)
- [`osi_conv_som()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_som.md)
  : Estimate soil organic matter and nutrient values (-)
- [`osi_conv_zinc()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_conv_zinc.md)
  : Estimate soil extractable zinc (-)
- [`osi_countries`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_countries.md)
  : Table with country codes used in the package
- [`osi_crops`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_crops.md)
  : Linking table between crops and different functions in OBIC
- [`osi_erosion()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_erosion.md)
  : Calculate the water erosion index using RUSLE approach
- [`osi_evaluate_logistic()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_evaluate_logistic.md)
  : Evaluate a soil quality function using the general logistic function
- [`osi_evaluate_logistic_gaus_down()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_evaluate_logistic_gaus_down.md)
  : Evaluate logistically initially and gausian eventually
- [`osi_evaluate_parabolic()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_evaluate_parabolic.md)
  : Evaluate a soil quality function using a parabolic function
- [`osi_farm`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_farm.md)
  : Example farm database to illustrate the functionality of the euosi
  package
- [`osi_field()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_field.md)
  : Calculate the Open Soil Index score for a single field using input
  from LUCAS
- [`osi_field_dt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_field_dt.md)
  : Calculate the OSI score for one field using a data.table as input
- [`osi_get_SOILTYPE_AGR()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_get_SOILTYPE_AGR.md)
  : Estimate agricultural soil type classification used in the
  Netherlands
- [`osi_get_TEXTURE_BE()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_get_TEXTURE_BE.md)
  : Estimate soil texture according to Belgium classification
- [`osi_get_TEXTURE_GEPPA()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_get_TEXTURE_GEPPA.md)
  : Estimate soil texture according to GEPPA classification
- [`osi_get_TEXTURE_HYPRES()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_get_TEXTURE_HYPRES.md)
  : Estimate soil texture according to HYPRES classification
- [`osi_get_TEXTURE_USDA()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_get_TEXTURE_USDA.md)
  : Estimate soil texture according to USDA classification
- [`osi_gw_nleach()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_gw_nleach.md)
  : Calculate the risk for nitrogen leaching in Europe
- [`osi_gw_nleach_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_gw_nleach_be.md)
  : Calculate the risk for nitrogen leaching in Belgium
- [`osi_gw_nleach_eu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_gw_nleach_eu.md)
  : Calculate the risk for nitrogen leaching template for EU
- [`osi_gw_nleach_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_gw_nleach_fr.md)
  : Calculate the risk for nitrogen leaching in France
- [`osi_nut_k()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k.md)
  : Calculate the K excess index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_nut_k_at()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_at.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Austria
- [`osi_nut_k_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_be.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Belgium
- [`osi_nut_k_ch()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_ch.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Switzerland
- [`osi_nut_k_cz()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_cz.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Czech Republic
- [`osi_nut_k_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_de.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Germany
- [`osi_nut_k_dk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_dk.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Denmark
- [`osi_nut_k_ee()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_ee.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Estonia
- [`osi_nut_k_el()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_el.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Greece
- [`osi_nut_k_es()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_es.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Spain
- [`osi_nut_k_fi()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_fi.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Finland
- [`osi_nut_k_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_fr.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in France
- [`osi_nut_k_hu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_hu.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Hungary
- [`osi_nut_k_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_ie.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Ireland
- [`osi_nut_k_it()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_it.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Italy
- [`osi_nut_k_lt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_lt.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Lithuania
- [`osi_nut_k_lv()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_lv.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Latvia
- [`osi_nut_k_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_nl.md)
  : Calculate the K excess index for the Netherlands
- [`osi_nut_k_no()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_no.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Norway
- [`osi_nut_k_pl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_pl.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Poland
- [`osi_nut_k_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_pt.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index index in Portugal
- [`osi_nut_k_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_ro.md)
  : Calculate thepotassium excess index in Romenia
- [`osi_nut_k_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_se.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Sweden
- [`osi_nut_k_sk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_sk.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Slovak Republic
- [`osi_nut_k_sl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_sl.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in Slovenia
- [`osi_nut_k_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_k_uk.md)
  : Calculate the potassium excess index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_nut_p()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p.md)
  : Calculate the phoshporus excesss index (wrapper function)
- [`osi_nut_p_at()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_at.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Austria
- [`osi_nut_p_be()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_be.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Belgium
- [`osi_nut_p_ch()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_ch.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Switzerland
- [`osi_nut_p_cz()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_cz.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Czech Republic
- [`osi_nut_p_de()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_de.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Germany
- [`osi_nut_p_dk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_dk.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Denmark
- [`osi_nut_p_ee()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_ee.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Estonia
- [`osi_nut_p_el()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_el.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Greece
- [`osi_nut_p_es()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_es.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Spain
- [`osi_nut_p_fi()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_fi.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Finland
- [`osi_nut_p_fr()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_fr.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in France
- [`osi_nut_p_hu()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_hu.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Hungary
- [`osi_nut_p_ie()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_ie.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Ireland
- [`osi_nut_p_it()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_it.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Italy
- [`osi_nut_p_lt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_lt.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Lithuania
- [`osi_nut_p_lv()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_lv.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Latvia
- [`osi_nut_p_nl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_nl.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in the Netherlands
- [`osi_nut_p_no()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_no.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Norway
- [`osi_nut_p_pl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_pl.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Poland
- [`osi_nut_p_pt()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_pt.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Portugal
- [`osi_nut_p_ro()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_ro.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index index in Romenia
- [`osi_nut_p_se()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_se.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in Sweden
- [`osi_nut_p_sk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_sk.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Slovak Republic
- [`osi_nut_p_sl()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_sl.md)
  : Calculate the phosphorus excess index in Slovenia
- [`osi_nut_p_uk()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_nut_p_uk.md)
  : Calculate the phosphate excess index in United Kingdom
- [`osi_p_crumbleability()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_p_crumbleability.md)
  : Calculate crumbleability index in the topsoil for all EU countries
- [`osi_p_density()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_p_density.md)
  : Calculate the bulk density
- [`osi_p_paw()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_p_paw.md)
  : Calculate indicator for plant available water
- [`osi_p_wef()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_p_wef.md)
  : Calculate indicator for wind erodibility
- [`osi_p_whc()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_p_whc.md)
  : Calculate indicators for water holding capacity in the topsoil
- [`osi_parms`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_parms.md)
  : Table with OSI parameters being used in the package
- [`osi_plot_shi()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_plot_shi.md)
  : This function calculates the phosphate availability.
- [`osi_soiltype`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_soiltype.md)
  : Table with country specific soil types being used to evaluate soil
  quality
- [`osi_thresholds`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_thresholds.md)
  : Table with country specific threshold values to evaluate
  soilquality' This table contains the evaluation coefficients to
  convert a soil function value into a soil quality score ranging from 0
  to 1. The scoring function migh vary per country, indicator and
  subcatogries defined by variable categories of soil and crop types.
- [`osi_vars_input`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_vars_input.md)
  : A dataset with all input variables required by the euosi package
- [`osi_vars_output`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/osi_vars_output.md)
  : A dataset with all output variables generated by the euosi package
- [`pF_curve()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/pF_curve.md)
  : Water retention curve
- [`pFpara_class()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/pFpara_class.md)
  : Parameter estimation based on class of Staringreeks (Tabel 3, Wosten
  2001)
- [`pFpara_ptf_Wosten1999()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/pFpara_ptf_Wosten1999.md)
  : Estimate water retention curve parameters based on Wosten 1999
- [`pFpara_ptf_Wosten2001()`](https://gerardhros.github.io/euosi/reference/pFpara_ptf_Wosten2001.md)
  : Estimate water retention curve parameters based on Wosten 2001
